entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dawson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Creek Airport 06:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 90 %

Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
